LanguageData.Apparel_TribalA.label: Φυλετική ενδυμασία
LanguageData.Apparel_TribalA.description: A garment crafted without machines using neolithic tools.
LanguageData.Apparel_Parka.label: parka
LanguageData.Apparel_Parka.description: A thick parka for staying warm in even the coldest of temperatures.
LanguageData.Apparel_Pants.label: pants
LanguageData.Apparel_BasicShirt.label: T-Shirt
LanguageData.Apparel_CollarShirt.label: Πουκάμισο
LanguageData.Apparel_CollarShirt.description: A nice-looking collared shirt with buttons.
LanguageData.Apparel_Duster.label: Πούπουλο
LanguageData.Apparel_Duster.description: A long duster coat for blocking the sun and grit of the desert.
LanguageData.Apparel_Jacket.label: Ζακέτα
LanguageData.Apparel_Jacket.description: A tough jacket to stop scrapes and bruises, and keep one warm in chilly weather.
LanguageData.Apparel_VestPlate.label: Γιλέκο
LanguageData.Apparel_VestPlate.description: A vest with armor plates inserted on the chest and back. Protects against gunfire.
LanguageData.Apparel_PowerArmor.label: Πανοπλία
LanguageData.Apparel_PowerArmor.description: Powered armor usually used by assault troops from advanced glitterworld planets.
